mapper.update: update l_settle set settleid=settleid ,settlecode=#{settlecode} ,settlename=#{settlename} where settleid=#{settleid}

update l_settle set settleid=settleid ,settlecode=#{settlecode} ,settlename=#{settlename} where 1=1 and settleid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and settleid =#{Where_Id} and settleid=#{Where_settleid} and settlecode=#{Where_settlecode} and settlename=#{Where_settlename}
mapper.select: select t.settleid "settleid", t.settlecode "settlecode", t.settlename "settlename" from l_settle t where settleid=#{settleid}
select t.settleid "settleid", t.settlecode "settlecode", t.settlename "settlename" from l_settle t where 1=1 and t.settleid=#{settleid} and t.settlecode=#{settlecode} and t.settlename=#{settlename}
select t.settleid "settleid", t.settlecode "settlecode", t.settlename "settlename" from l_settle t where 1=1 and t.settleid=#{settleid} and t.settlecode=#{settlecode} and t.settlename=#{settlename}
mapper.delete: delete from l_settle where 1=1 and settleid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and settleid =#{Where_Id} and settleid=#{Where_settleid} and settlecode=#{Where_settlecode} and settlename=#{Where_settlename}
mapper.select: select t.settleid "settleid", t.settlecode "settlecode", t.settlename "settlename" from l_settle t where 1=1 and t.settleid=#{settleid} and t.settlecode=#{settlecode} and t.settlename like #{settlename}
select count(*) from l_settle t where 1=1 and t.settleid=#{settleid} and t.settleid!=#{NoId} and t.settlecode=#{settlecode} and t.settlename like #{settlename}
SELECT COUNT(*) from l_settle where 1=1 and settlename=#{settlename} and settleid!=#{settleid}
